Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Parigidin-br1 (natural AMPs; XXC; 3S=S, UCBB1ab; cyclotides; plants; ZZI)

Literature Information.Literature: This circular peptide showed no antibacterial activity. However, it is insecticidal presumbly by lysis of insect cells. The peptide is also hemolytic (41% at 40 uM). A theoretic model is provided in the paper.
Literature Information.Author: Pinto MF, Fensterseifer IC, Migliolo L, Sousa DA, de Capdville G, Arboleda-Valencia JW, Colgrave ML, Craik DJ, Magalh√£es BS, Dias SC, Franco OL2012, Brazil, South America
Literature Information.Reference: J Biol Chem. 2012 Jan 2;287(1):134-47. Epub 2011 Nov 10PubMed.
Literature Information.Title: Identification and Structural Characterization of Novel Cyclotide with Activity against an Insect Pest of Sugar Cane
